body_html:
It looks like resampler op kernels are excluded from the windows cmake build:
a80c8b5
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blame/r1.4/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_core_kernels.cmake#L160

Also, resampler ops cuda kernels are not included in GPU kernels that need to be built:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_core_kernels.cmake#L181

You can try editing the lines I linked above and rebuilding from sources, but the build may fail. It is contrib, so my knowledge about why the build failed in June and this was excluded ends here.

a80c8b5
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blame/r1.4/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_core_kernels.cmake#L160
Also, resampler ops cuda kernels are not included in GPU kernels that need to be built:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_core_kernels.cmake#L181
You can try editing the lines I linked above and rebuilding from sources, but the build may fail. It is contrib, so my knowledge about why the build failed in June and this was excluded ends here.
body:
It looks like resampler op kernels are excluded from the windows cmake build:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/a80c8b583fa3d619b358a91aefd05069227b8967
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blame/r1.4/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_core_kernels.cmake#L160

Also, resampler ops cuda kernels are not included in GPU kernels that need to be built:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_core_kernels.cmake#L181

You can try editing the lines I linked above and rebuilding from sources, but the build may fail. It is contrib, so my knowledge about why the build failed in June and this was excluded ends here.
